about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Unknown Rules is an independently developed first person horror puzzle game where you can team up with up to 3 friends.
When you wake up, you are in an unknown area and need to figure out what is happening here. Through continuous exploration, you realize that there seems to be some kind of creature living here, and those who have come here are actively conveying certain information.
If you want to survive here, you need to properly store and use all the props you can obtain. You have an 8-compartment backpack and 2-compartment pockets to pick up items, such as collecting medicines from the map to stay rational, and using functional drinks to recover energy and avoid monster attacks.
In the game, there are some random events set up, such as random teleportation. You need to adapt to the rhythm of the game to constantly explore. I have designed various puzzles from simple to difficult, some of which require players to communicate and cooperate with each other to avoid running back and forth in the game scene. The puzzles and monsters in each game may not be the same. You need to first obtain rule notes to gradually analyze the puzzle solving steps.
There is currently one level in the game.

LEVEL


Level 1: School.

This is a strange school with a total of 29 classrooms. Although they have been abandoned for many years, some of the facilities seem to be regularly cleaned by people, and many classrooms also have signs of use. You can find people trying to convey a certain message to you from various places.
You need to explore the entire teaching building and gradually understand the rules at this moment. As you delve deeper, you discover that there are other things living here, and you need to find a way to leave.

FEATURES


Endurance: Your endurance is limited, which is the most important thing to pay attention to when facing danger.
Rationality: When encountering supernatural phenomena, fear will gradually devour you.
Health: If you encounter a monster that is not extremely powerful, you may still survive the encounter.
Monster: This is an unknown life form, not all monsters are interested in you, but it's best to avoid it from a distance.

DEVELOP ROADMAP


I will continue to improve the game and add more new content to maintain its playability, such as:
New monsters, maps, random events, and more.
